imagingbook.pub.morphology

Class BinaryMorphologyFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.morphology.BinaryMorphologyFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryMorphologyFilter.Box, BinaryMorphologyFilter.Disk

    public class BinaryMorphologyFilter
extends Object
    This class implements binary morphological filters. Original version 2007. TODO: Make a subclass for thinning.
    Version:
    2015-07-08
